description: Eastern Redbud (Cercis Canadensis 'Silver Cloud') is an amazing species of plant due to its unique color and special characteristics. This tree has a magnificent silver-tinted foliage that stands out among other trees, and produces stunning clusters of pink and white spring flowers. Furthermore, it is a low-maintenance and drought-tolerant tree, meaning it requires minimal resources to maintain it. In addition, this species is a great choice for smaller gardens as it will not outgrow the space, and can be pruned to maintain its size. Eastern Redbud is a truly stunning plant that offers beauty and a medley of benefits!
